availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer. Culpepper County, Virginia, native. Married Lucy McQuinn. Father of Harvey McQuinn, Alexander McQuinn, Louisa McQuinn, and Shadrack McQuinn. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1850 and 1860. Appointed a justice of the peace in Breathitt County on December 19, 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District No. 2, p. 6B; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District No. 1, p. 26; KYR-0001-017-0039.
